ValidationRule.description: Prevents Users from changing value to the Ethnicity field if it already has a value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Ethnicity__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Ethnicity__c ) , 'HA1'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Ethnicity__c ) , 'HA2'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Ethnicity__c ) , 'HA3'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Ethnicity__c ) , 'HA4'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Ethnicity__c ) , 'HA5') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ethnicity field already has an HA value, you cannot change it.
